skillTree.name: Gnoblar Inventor
skillTree.description: "Gross incompetence, theft and constant bickering are just some of the factors stacked against budding Gnoblar inventors."

skillTree.name: Artifact Seller
skillTree.description: The Magpies sell many artefacts taken from the corpses of great heroes or looted from fabulous ruins. Most of these items are obviously faked and replaced after each sale, but the far-fetched stories behind them have normally been in the merchant's family for generations.

skillTree.name: Technical Enhancements
skillTree.description: Scrappers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Bellower
skillTree.description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield and encouraging unbridled carnage.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Stirring Bolts
skillTree.description: Inspired by the bolts used by the Stir River Patrol, these bolts will ignite foes and everything else that gets in their way. Useful for making camp fires too.

effects.description:
"Stirring Bolts" ammunition (projectiles causes fire damage) for Rustbuckets units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Rustbuckets units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Hammer of Maw
skillTree.description: Smite the foe with pile of rocks, that will certainly blind them at the very least.

effects.description:
"Hammer of Maw" ammunition (projectiles cause "Blinded" effect) for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Hero's army)

Range: +12% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Venomous Pellets
skillTree.description: Even a sling can be a dangerous weapon when using these pellets that have some snake and scorpion venom in them.

effects.description:
"Venomous Pellet" ammunition (projectiles cause poison damage) for Gnoblar Flingers units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +50% for Gnoblar Flingers units
	(Hero's army)

Range: +12% for Gnoblar Flingers units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Boomstick
skillTree.description: "It goes BOOOM! when you throw it! Very complicated, but very deadly. Just don't test it in MY tent!"

effects.description:
"Boomstick" ammunition (projectiles cause explosive damage) for Pigback Tossers units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for Pigback Tossers units
	(Hero's army)

Range: +12% for Pigback Tossers units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Obsessed with Scrap
skillTree.description: This one hoards everything they can scavenge, also hates selling any of his precious treasures.

effects.description: Loot Scrap Piles action: Scrap collected from scrap piles is increased by an additional +5%
Loot Scrap Piles action: Scrap collected from scrap piles is increased by an additional +10%
Loot Scrap Piles action: Scrap collected from scrap piles is increased by an additional +15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Scrap Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once valuable scrap is acquired, this one will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

backgroundSkills.name: Farter
backgroundSkills.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

backgroundSkills.name: Flabby
backgroundSkills.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Daddy
backgroundSkills.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

backgroundSkills.name: Maw Preacher
backgroundSkills.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."

effects.description: This character can loot scrap piles
